text.autoconfig.fuzzy.title: Fuzzy Configuration
text.autoconfig.fuzzy.option.fuzzySearch: Only shows fuzzy search results with a score higher than or equal to the set threshold, indicating a close match to the search term.
Defines the maximum number of results returned from a fuzzy search.
text.autoconfig.fuzzy.option.clearOnJoin: Automatically clears previous commands when switching the server.
text.autoconfig.fuzzy.option.showScore.@: Displays the relevancy score of each result in fuzzy searches. The higher the number, the more closely the result matches your search query.
